snippet: Sarah Lyall is in Pretoria covering the verdict in the Oscar Pistorius case. While awaiting the final verdict, she reflected on the South African justice system and provided a sense of the scene inside and outside the courtroom.
abstract: Sarah Lyall is in Pretoria covering the verdict in the Oscar Pistorius case. While awaiting the final verdict, she reflected on the South African justice system and provided a sense of the scene inside and outside the courtroom.

headline.main: Sobbing and Electricity: Sarah Lyall Awaits the Final Pistorius Verdict in Pretoria
